snippet.title: Last Hope (Dreamcast) NO MISS
snippet.description:
This is my no death run of Last Hope played on the Dreamcast. The video also shows off some rudimentary scoring, e.g. defeating the stage 2 boss with a multiplier from the small enemies for a big score boost.

This game is often said to be overly difficult. However, just like with any other more traditional shmup, Last Hope's difficulty can be trivialized a lot by memorizing a route through the game. A case in point is also the safe spot on the final boss.

This play was featured on the "Tactical Super Play"-DVD bundled with the Neo Geo CD port of the game released in 2007.

The gameplay is uploaded to YouTube with permission of NG:DEV.TEAM.

0:00​​ Stage 1
2:50 Stage 2
6:15 Stage 3
9:19​​ Stage 4
11:44​​ Stage 5
14:48​​ Stage 6

---------------------------------------

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/plasmo_stg
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Plasmo_STG
